description:
The club members go shopping for protective gear. After trying on their protective gear, Kojirou nicknames Tamaki "Red", the leader of the kendo club`s female team, Kirino is nicknamed "Yellow", and Miyako is nicknamed "Pink". The fourth female member of the kendo club, Sayako Kuwahara nicknamed "Blue", is revealed, and has a painful first encounter with Miyako`s "Black" personality. Kojirou will nickname the last female club member "Green".
Source: Wiki
